dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] portsmouthhabitat.com]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 06, 2005 11:29 AM
To: tom.provost@portsmouthunderground.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] portsmouthhabitat.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] portsmouthhabitat.com
Date: Tue, 5 Apr 2005 16:08:52 -0400
From: Tom Provost <tom.provost@portsmouthunderground.com>
Organization: Portsmouth Underground
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

I noticed you are hosting the domain. Please be aware that this "company"
has violated multiple copyrights as well as plagarized authors that are
current customers of mine. If this were to occur on your server, I would
expect results similar to those provided by the host of their last domain.

Thank You
T Provost


- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCVA5IvK/XpJs6oyURAhy2AJ9HjImw7+anevEbwxvi/dOgo86/5ACeKQpd
9k1V1DUnlryEsFdSwRr+PSk=
=xyZH
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
